title: Create a NetworkManager connection profile named 'myprofile1' for the enp0s3 device with the given settings. Ensure the connection is running and add secondary IPv4 and IPv6 addresses to the profile.

steps.instruction: Display the current network interfaces to verify the existence of the 'enp0s3' device.
Add a new NetworkManager connection profile named 'myprofile1' for the 'enp0s3' device.
steps.answer: nmcli con add type ethernet con-name myprofile1 ifname enp0s3
